constituent: sea, water, water droplets, water pistol, every, reclining, lying down, mother, breasts
heisigStory: Behind every drop of water, a sea from which it originated.
koohiiStory1: Every drop of water will eventually return to the sea.
koohiiStory2: As depicted in the classic SF film Fantastic Voyage, every drop of water is a sea, if you look close enough. Imagine peering through a microscope at a vast sea teeming with microbial life (and perhaps a minaturized submarine). Note: Take care not to confuse with ocean (#549).
myStory: biển. mỗi giọt nước đều chạy ra biển
